overview: ALMOST is a movie centering on the survival mood an average Nigerian have to run on a daily basis. Often times searching for “greener pastures” becomes appealing and they take the available means or so it seems, migrating, a path which puts our character on a journey in which he finds himself and more, the betrayal and love births our character who in the course of finding “greener pastures” fate brings to him his heartthrob, his Erica and even that he has to earn in his survival mood.
title: Almost
